attributes.action: Give all NHS workers a pay rise of at least 3%
attributes.additional_details: Because the NHS frontline have saved many lives during the pandemic, they have moved away from their children and loved ones, lost colleagues and loved ones and still battled on throughout and they don’t have any payrise it seems wrong
attributes.background:
The NHS has saved my life many times they have helped me with my conditions as I’m disabled and they now need our support.

The fact that currently have a 1% pay rise is disgusting.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Support NHS staff with a pay rise this year of 3% or more
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578071

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970
